name: Corpus
description:
A measure of the totality of text upon the scale of a human life.

A mourning for my motivation to read long form work.

A love letter found in the Library of Babel.

Maybe just a Reading Simulator.

There is an ending.

There is a cat.

My first Bitsy.  Just click in the game window and use arrow keys to play.  A playthrough should be around 15-30 mins. DISCLAIMER: The Reader's opinions are their own.
